subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Baylor has drawn attention with its first N.C.A.A. appearance since 1988. But the bigger story line is the team’s pursuit of John Wall, the nation’s top prep player.
snippet: Baylor has drawn attention with its first N.C.A.A. appearance since 1988. But the bigger story line is the team’s pursuit of John Wall, the nation’s top prep player.
